description: The Project aims to strengthen co-ordination mechanisms between federal and the participating states and LGAs; established, effective and functional community based participatory disease survelliance network for Avian Influenza

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacity to deliver improved justice and security, including safeguarding citizen security, in conflict-affected settings
